scripts.allure: mkdir -p allure-results/history && cp -r allure-report/history allure-results && allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report && allure open allure-report
scripts.allure-CI: mkdir -p allure-results/history && cp -r allure-report/history allure-results || true && npx allure-commandline generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report
